body_html:
Hi Michael,

Yes, here is the information

Operating System: Ubuntu 16.04.1 LTS (GNU/Linux 4.4.0-53-generic x86_64)

Setup:
tensorflow installed via "pip install tensorflow-gpu"
CUDA 8.0 & cuDNN 3.5
4 Tesla K80 (2 GPUs per card) @ 24GB per card

body:
Hi Michael,

Yes, here is the information

Operating System: Ubuntu 16.04.1 LTS (GNU/Linux 4.4.0-53-generic x86_64)

Setup:

  CUDA 8.0 & cuDNN 3.5
  4 Tesla K80 (2 GPUs per card) @ 24GB per card
